newsitem.title: USA: MasTec to buy stake in Inepar SA.
newsitem.headline: MasTec to buy stake in Inepar SA.

text.p: MasTec Inc said it has agreement to acquire a controlling interest in Inepar SA Industria e Construcoes's telecommunications infrastructure construction division.

Under the deal, MasTec is to invest $29.4 million in new capital in the company for a 50 percent interest. It also allows MasTec to acquire an additional 1 percent interest from Inepar for MasTec shares.
The new venture will do business as Inepar-MasTec, the companies said.

Upon its formation, Inepar-MasTec will have a backlog of telecommunications infrastructure projects in excess of $230 million with near-term prospects for significant additional projects, the companies said.
